kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=api, url=http://127.0.0.1:5000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/movies path_url=/api/movies headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '104', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"id": "101", "movie_name": "Interstellar", "language": "English", "duration": "2h 49m", "price": "250"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
